pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pupil-pthreads-winThis is a precompiled version of pthreads for windows wrapped in a python package.We use it as dependency for various modules for the pupil core software.This wrapper contains a x64 precompiled version of pthreads-win 2.9.1 from https://sourceware.org/pthreads-win32/ from Ross Johnson.The original licensing information can be found in [COPYING](src/pupil_pthreads_win/data/COPYING) and [COPYING.LIB](src/pupil_pthreads_win/data/COPYING.LIB).## InstallationNote that this library only provides pthreads for windows and thus you are not recommended to use it on another operating system. When trying to use it on another operating system, you might receive a warning.Install from PyPI:```bashpip install pupil-pthreads-win```# Changelog## 2 - 2019-09-18### Added* License files and source attribution for pthreads-win.* License file for pupil-pthreads-win.## 1 - 2019-08-27Initial release.
